text:
and in all of it — this asshole: 

<http://pitchfork.com/news/62625-martin-shkreli-premieres-unreleased-wu-tang-clan-clips-after-trump-win/>

attachments.title: Martin Shkreli Premieres Unreleased Wu-Tang Clan Music After Trump Win
attachments.text: Shkreli, who owns the only copy of Once Upon a Time in Shaolin, said he’d release it if Trump became president
attachments.fallback: Pitchfork: Martin Shkreli Premieres Unreleased Wu-Tang Clan Music After Trump Win
